document.full_text: a gale force in the shape of roger federer blew aside local favorite gael monfils 6-4 6-3 7-6 on a blustery tuesday at the french open as the swiss set up a mouth-watering french open semi-final with novak djokovic.
document.title: federer produces masterclass at french open
lines_and_colors: a gale force in the shape of roger federer blew aside local favorite gael monfils 6-4 6-3 7-6 on a blustery tuesday at the french open as the swiss set up a mouth-watering french open semi-final with novak djokovic.
